channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Daily Covid-19 Briefing
item.description: Daily Covid-19 Briefing Wednesday, May 05, 2021 - Prepared by ALPINE1 Today 2,327 new cases of Covid-19 were identified in the province. The adjusted total of cases is 2,271 including changes to previous case numbers between March 30th and May 3rd. The current seven day rolling average of cases is 2,057, an increase of 3.4% from the day before. This time last week the rolling average was 1,638. This is an increase of 26%.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 102 Edmonton Zone 51 South Zone 20 Central Zone 20 North Zone 43 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, May 04, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Active VOC cases 14358 -370 VOC Percentage 59.4% -2.91% Total VOC cases 36793 903 Total VOC recovered 22335 1272 Total deaths from VOC 100 1 VOC specimens screened 63914 1162 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Tue, May 04, 2021
